question.title: Spring Boot 3.4.1 - Swagger UI 404 Error: "No static resource" from openapi yaml file
question.body:
After upgrading my Spring Boot application from version 3.3.7 to 3.4.1, I can no longer access the Swagger UI at http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui/index.html.

Instead, I encounter the following issues:

In the browser: "Failed to load API definition." In the console: 404 NOT_FOUND "No static resource openapi/api-v1.0.yaml." When I revert back to Spring Boot 3.3.7, everything works as expected, and the Swagger UI loads without any errors.

My setup: OpenAPI generator version: 7.10.0 The OpenAPI file is located at: src/main/resources/openapi/api-v1.0.yaml

Here is my Swagger UI configuration (swagger-ui-config.js):

   const ui = SwaggerUIBundle({
       url: "/openapi/api-v1.0.yaml",
       dom_id: '#swagger-ui',
       deepLinking: true,
       presets: [
           SwaggerUIBundle.presets.apis,
           SwaggerUIStandalonePreset
       ],
       plugins: [
           SwaggerUIBundle.plugins.DownloadUrl
       ],
       layout: "StandaloneLayout",
       oauth2RedirectUrl: window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.hostname + ":" + window.location.port + "/swagger-ui/oauth2-redirect.html",
       withCredentials: true
   });

   ui.initOAuth({
       clientId: "boilerplate-oidc",
       scopes: "arca role-ccx-irn76264",
       usePkceWithAuthorizationCodeGrant: true
   });

   window.ui = ui;
}

OpenAPI Gradle configuration:

    main {
        java {
            srcDir file("${buildDir}/generated-api/src/main/java")
        }
    }
}

openApiValidate {
    inputSpec = "$rootDir/src/main/resources/openapi/api-v1.0.yaml".toString()
}

openApiGenerate {
    templateDir = "$rootDir/src/main/resources/openapi/templates".toString()
    generatorName = "spring"
    library = "spring-boot"
    validateSpec = true
    inputSpec = "$rootDir/src/main/resources/openapi/api-v1.0.yaml".toString()
    outputDir = "$buildDir/generated-api".toString()
    globalProperties = [
        apis    : "",
        models  : ""
    ]
    configOptions = [
        useSpringBoot3         : "true",
        reactive               : "true" ...
    ]
}

task packageDistributionApiV1(type: Zip) {
    dependsOn("processResources")
    description "Creating ZIP file for API contract"
    archiveClassifier = 'api-v1.0'
    from("$buildDir/resources/main/openapi/") {
        include "api-v1.0.yaml"
    }
}

assemble.dependsOn tasks.packageDistributionApiV1
tasks.openApiGenerate.dependsOn tasks.openApiValidate
compileJava.dependsOn tasks.openApiGenerate```

Steps Iâ€™ve tried:

Verified that the OpenAPI file api-v1.0.yaml exists in the correct location (src/main/resources/openapi/). Checked the build output to ensure the file is being packaged correctly. Reverted back to Spring Boot 3.3.7, and the issue disappears.

Questions:

Has the way Spring Boot serves static resources changed in version 3.4.1? Is there an additional configuration required for serving the OpenAPI file in the newer version? How can I fix this issue so that the Swagger UI works in Spring Boot 3.4.1?

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!
